name: Everytime
content: 让我成为你的目光焦点
为何不让我进入你的生命
I guess I need you baby
And everytime I see you in my dreams
I guess I need you baby
I make believe that you are here
It's the only way I see clear
唯有这样我才能看清一切
You seem to move on easy
让你离开了我 不再眷恋
I guess I need you baby
And everytime I see you in my dreams
每次我在梦中与你相见
I guess I need you baby
I may have made it rain
我的弱点曾给你带来苦痛
And this song is my sorry
And this song is my sorry
I guess I need you baby
And everytime I see you in my dreams
I guess I need you baby
And this song is my sorry
And this song is my sorry
